languages.text: "Косматый, словами не могу передать, как мне жаль, что не ты задаешь правила во Дворце Правосудия!"

traits.locale_text: "Косматый, словами не могу передать, как мне жаль, что не ты задаешь правила во Дворце Правосудия!"

languages.text: "Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"
languages.original_text: "Косматый, словами не могу передать, как мне жаль, что не ты задаешь правила во Дворце Правосудия!"

traits.locale_text: "Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"
"Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"
"Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"
"Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"
"Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"
"Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"

languages.text: 「大男さん、あなたが司法宮の規則を仕切ってないのは、本当に残念としか言いようがないわね！」
languages.original_text: "Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"

traits.locale_text: 「大男さん、あなたが司法宮の規則を仕切ってないのは、本当に残念としか言いようがないわね！」

languages.text: "Großer Mann, ich kann gar nicht in Worte fassen, welch ein Jammer es ist, dass Ihr nicht für die Regeln im Justizpalast zuständig seid!"
languages.original_text: "Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"

traits.locale_text: "Großer Mann, ich kann gar nicht in Worte fassen, welch ein Jammer es ist, dass Ihr nicht für die Regeln im Justizpalast zuständig seid!"

languages.text: « Oh, le géant, vous n'imaginez pas comme j'aimerais que ce soit vous qui fixiez les règles du palais de justice ! »
languages.original_text: "Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, le géant, vous n'imaginez pas comme j'aimerais que ce soit vous qui fixiez les règles du palais de justice ! »

languages.text: «¡Hombretón, no tengo palabras para expresar lo apenada que estoy de que no se encargue usted de las reglas en el Palacio de la Justicia!».
languages.original_text: "Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Hombretón, no tengo palabras para expresar lo apenada que estoy de que no se encargue usted de las reglas en el Palacio de la Justicia!».

languages.text: “可不是嘛，大块头！正义大殿的规矩不让你说了算，你简直都不知道该怎么遗憾才好了！”
languages.original_text: "Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"

traits.locale_text: “可不是嘛，大块头！正义大殿的规矩不让你说了算，你简直都不知道该怎么遗憾才好了！”

languages.text: "Adalet Sarayı'nın başına seni geçirmeyenler utansın be koca oğlan!"
languages.original_text: "Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"

traits.locale_text: "Adalet Sarayı'nın başına seni geçirmeyenler utansın be koca oğlan!"

languages.original_text: "Big man, words can't express what a shame it is that you're not in charge of the rules at the Palace of Justice!"
